text: فَكَانَ عَٰقِبَتَهُمَآ أَنَّهُمَا فِي ٱلنَّارِ خَٰلِدَيۡنِ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَـٰٓؤُاْ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

translation.en: So the outcome for both of them is that they will be in the Fire, abiding eternally therein. And that is the recompense of the wrong-doers
translation.id: Maka kesudahan bagi keduanya, bahwa keduanya masuk ke dalam neraka, kekal di dalamnya. Demikianlah balasan bagi orang-orang zalim
